inventory=[{"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 26}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 39}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft cooked_chicken, I need to smelt the chicken at slot 42 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
act: smelt from slot 42 to slot 12 with quantity 1
